bibl.title: The Darb el-Arbain, the Kharga Oasis and its Forts, and Other Desert Routes.
Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993
bibl.author: MORKOT, Robert

bibl.note: Meroites, Blemmyes, Noubades and Rome's Egyptian frontier. - Kharga, the Oasis Magna, and its forts. - Trade routes. - The Darb el-Arbain, the Darb el-Gaballa and other routes. - Conclusions.
MORKOT Robert, The Darb el-Arbain, the Kharga Oasis and its Forts, and Other Desert Routes.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 82-94, 3 cartes, 1 plan.
